data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Heteropogon Loew, 1847 (Diptera: Asilidae) from Russia and Central Asia, with description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sаkhvon, Vitаl V., Lelej, Аrkаdy S. (2018): Review of the genus Heteropogon Loew, 1847 (Diptera: Asilidae) from Russia and Central Asia, with description of two new species. Zootaxa 4486 (4): 435-450, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4486.4.2
